definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
to accelerate at full power (idiom); at full speed/fig. to work as hard as possible
to go at full throttle/(fig.) to go all out/to kick into high gear
just as distance determines the stamina of a horse, so does time reveal a person's true heart (proverb)
pinyin: lu4 yao2 zhi1 ma3 li4 , ri4 jiu3 jian4 ren2 xin1
containing_words.word: 路遙知馬力，日久見人心

sentences.english: We must first calculate the horse-power needed to propel the ship.
sentences.chinese: 我們必須首先計算出驅動這艘船需要多大馬力。

sentences.english: The unidentified armed group used guns to force the Chinese crew to increase speed sailing towards Thailand.
sentences.chinese: 不明武裝用槍逼着中國船員加足馬力向泰國駛去。

sentences.english: He drove the police car at full throttle and dashed at the gangsters.
sentences.chinese: 他駕駛着警車開足馬力向匪徒衝去。

sentences.english: No matter what car you drive, you have to appreciate the hot rod.
sentences.chinese: 無論您開什麼車，您一定會喜歡高速的大馬力汽車。

sentences.english: Kobe and Team USA are gearing up for the qualifying tourney.
sentences.chinese: 奧運會資格，科比和美國隊都開足了馬力。

sentences.english: My set of wheels can really haul because the engine's been souped up .
sentences.chinese: 由於我加大了引擎的馬力，這車還真能跑。
顯著均衡的3馬力主軸電機。

sentences.english: China's own automakers are also revving up production.
sentences.chinese: 中國本土的汽車製造商也在開足馬力提高產能。

sentences.english: San Marino has been occupied by foreign militaries three times in its history, for only short periods of time.
sentences.chinese: 聖馬力諾在歷史上有過三次被外國軍隊短期侵佔。

sentences.english: The boats with engines are air charging ones made of glass fiber reinforced plastics, equipped with double horsepower engines and a framework as well.
sentences.chinese: 動力艇爲玻璃鋼充氣艇，配備雙馬力引擎，附有船架。

sentences.english: What are the engine's horsepower and rpm range?
sentences.chinese: 引擎的馬力和轉速是多少？

sentences.english: The non-turbo is expected to put out about 250bhp.
sentences.chinese: 這臺非渦輪發動機預計能產生250個制動馬力。

sentences.english: It delivers a maximum output of 300 hp and 300 lb-ft.
sentences.chinese: 它提供了一個300馬力和300磅英尺的最大輸出。
這臺發動機產生120馬力功率。

sentences.english: First, make sure the computer has the horsepower for the job.
sentences.chinese: 首先，你得確定計算機有足夠馬力完成這項工作。

definition: (bus, train etc) depot/car factory or repair shop
to dig out/to excavate/to scoop out
pipeline/general term for pipes, cables etc
to generate electricity/to send a telegram
